Title: Requires lending institutions to supply customers with PINs to be used in conjunction with any chip-embedded credit card
Summary: Requires lending institutions to supply customers with PINs to be used in conjunction with any chip-embedded credit card.
LawCode: Amd ยง2, add ยง9-x, Bank L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law, in relation to requiring lending institutions to provide PINs simultaneously with the issuance of smart chip credit cards
